description: Sierre Leone is indefinitely closing schools and all other learning institutions as of 31st March after recording of the country's first case of the Coronavirus.

description: Sierre leone is calling a 12 month state of Public health emergency as of March 24th despite having not recorded any cases of the Coronavirus at that time.
On March 27th, the government of Sierre Leone announced the the country will be closing its borders fo3 30 days with the exception of cargo vehicles which will be inspected and monitored.
Sierre Leone announces three day nationwide lockdown effective from April 4th.
type_text: A nationwide lockdown was put in place where citizens are not allowed to leave their homes

description: Sierre Leone is enforcing mandatory  quarantine to British Nationals or passengers from countries with over 50 cases of the coronavirus from 16th March. the government discouraged travel of nationals from these countries but if it was essential travel they would be quarantined fir 14 days.
type_sub_cat: Government Quarantine (i.e. quarantine at a government hotel or facility)
